headline: MYR Group Inc. Subsidiary Awarded Design-Build Electric Distribution Master Service Agreement with Xcel Energy
summary: THORNTON, Colo., July 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- MYR Group Inc. (“MYR Group”) (NASDAQ: MYRG), a holding company of leading specialty contractors serving the electric utility infrastructure, commercial and industrial construction markets in the United States and Canada, announced that an MYR Group subsidiary has executed a five-year Design-Build Electric Distribution Master Service Agreement (MSA) with Xcel Energy Inc. (Xcel Energy). The MSA includes turnkey, design-build distribution services

content.title: MYR Group Inc. Subsidiary Awarded Design-Build Electric Distribution Master Service Agreement with Xcel Energy
